name: base-backend-express
description: Proyecto base para crear servicios web con Express (Framework de NodeJS).
author: Alex Quispe <q.wilmer.alex@gmail.com>

scripts.restart: sequelize --env development db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize --env development db:migrate && sequelize --env development db:seed:all && node app.js
scripts.test: sequelize --env test db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize --env test db:migrate && sequelize --env test db:seed:all && mocha test/routes/**/*.js
